Package com.controller

Class RoomControl

java.lang.Object
com.controller.RoomControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CreatorController<Room>
public class RoomControl extends Object implements CreatorController<Room>
RoomControl.java A controller class that realises the CreatorController interface. It consists of methods that will enable its users to control the outcome of a Room object.
Author:
DSF1 Group 1

  • Method Details

    • manageCreateEntry

      public Room manageCreateEntry()
      manageCreateEntry() It is a method that would create a new Room object. If the object created is valid, it will be subsequently serialised into the RoomDB.
      Specified by:
      manageCreateEntry in interface CreatorController<Room>
      Returns:
      the Room object that is created

    • manageCreateEntry

      public Room manageCreateEntry(LocalDate cID, LocalDate cOD)
      manageCreateEntry() It is an overloaded method that takes in date parameters in the process of creating a Room object. If the object created is valid, it will be subsequently serialised into the RoomDB.
      Parameters:
      cID - this is the check-in date.
      cOD - this is the check-out date.
      Returns:
      the Room object that is created.

    • displayAllOptions

      public void displayAllOptions()
      displayAllOptions() It is a method that will print all the amenities and rates of each RoomType in the hotel.

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom(int roomnumber)
      getRoom() It is a getter function that will get a Room object by its room number.
      Parameters:
      roomnumber - the particular room number that is being searched for.
      Returns:
      the Room object that is being searched for.

    • manageUpdateEntry

      public Room manageUpdateEntry()
      manageUpdateEntry() It is a method that updates the status of the Room object, which will then be serialised into the DB.
      Returns:
      the Room object that has been just updated.

    • getAllRooms

      public List<Room> getAllRooms()
      getAllRooms() It is a method that gets all the rooms that are serialised in the RoomDB.
      Returns:
      the list of Room objects within the RoomDB.
